content: this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2022 for personal use only do not copy sell alter or distribute this pattern or parts of it you may sell a limited number of your handmade finished items provided you credit icrochetthings as the designer size 4 tall materials * dk weight yarn in green * c 2 75mm crochet hook * stuffing * scissors * yarn needle some knowledge of embroidery is needed to complete the pattern as shown you should be familiar with the following technique s * chain stitch
